data.title: wordpunct_tokenize and double punctuation
data.text:
pierre baral

unread,

to nltk-...@googlegroups.com

I do not know if it is the normal behaviour of the function wordpunct_tokenize()

so I post here ;-) Maybe someone can help me.

Here is my problem:

1. I use wordpunct_tokenize() on the following string:

str1 = 'Selon le journal "100%" la validation des comptes de campagne d Edouard Balladur par le Conseil constitutionnel en octobre 1995 aurait ete "une belle entourloupe" dans un entretien jeudi au "Parisien".'

2. When I print the tokens, I have in the list the following strings:

"%

".

Is there a way (with NLTK) to remove the words that contain ONLY punctuation and are longer than 1 character?

(I thought it was the case with wordpunct_tokenize)

Regards,
